verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> of the <S%H4480>inheritance<s%> <S%H5159><s%> of their <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in;<s%> and ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> also unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> for the <S%H5892>cities<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> them.

And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall they <S%H1961>have<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in;<s%> and the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of them shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for their <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and for their <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2416>beasts.<s%>

And the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> shall reach from the <S%H4480>wall<s%> <S%H7023><s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H2351>outward<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H4058>measure<s%> from <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H853>on<s%> the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and on the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> to them the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

And <S%H854>among<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> there shall <S%H853>be<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>appoint<s%> for the <S%H7523>manslayer,<s%> that he may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>thither:<s%> and <S%H5921>to<s%> them ye shall <S%H5414>add<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5892>cities:<s%> them shall ye give <S%H854>with<s%> their <S%H4054>suburbs.<s%>

And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> shall be of the <S%H4480>possession<s%> <S%H272><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> them that have <S%H7227>many<s%> ye shall give <S%H7235>many;<s%> but <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> them that have <S%H4592>few<s%> ye shall give <S%H4591>few:<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> of his <S%H4480>cities<s%> <S%H5892><s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according <S%H6310>to<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5157>inheriteth.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3588>When<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> be come <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%>

Then ye shall <S%H7136>appoint<s%> you <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%> for you; that the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> which <S%H5221>killeth<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> at <S%H7684>unawares.<s%>

And they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto you <S%H5892>cities<s%> for <S%H4733>refuge<s%> from the <S%H4480>avenger;<s%> <S%H1350><s%> that the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
And of these <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall ye <S%H1961>have<s%> for <S%H4733>refuge.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> on this <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall ye <S%H5414>give<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> which shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> both for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> and for the <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them: that every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H5221>killeth<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unawares<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H5221>smite<s%> him with an <S%H3627>instrument<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> so that he <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is a <S%H7523>murderer:<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H5221>smite<s%> him with <S%H3027>throwing<s%> a <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> he may <S%H4191>die,<s%> and he <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is a <S%H7523>murderer:<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> if he <S%H5221>smite<s%> him with a <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> he may <S%H4191>die,<s%> and he <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is a <S%H7523>murderer:<s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

The <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7523>murderer:<s%> when he <S%H6293>meeteth<s%> him, <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> him.
But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H1920>thrust<s%> him of <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7993>hurl<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> him by laying of <S%H6660>wait,<s%> that he <S%H4191>die;<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> in <S%H342>enmity<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> him with his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that he <S%H4191>die:<s%> he that <S%H5221>smote<s%> him shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> <S%H4191><s%> for <S%H1931>he<s%> is a <S%H7523>murderer:<s%> the <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7523>murderer,<s%> when he <S%H6293>meeteth<s%> him.

But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H1920>thrust<s%> him <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H342>enmity,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> have <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him any <S%H3605>thing<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> laying of <S%H6660>wait,<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> a man may <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H7200>seeing<s%> him <S%H3808>not,<s%> and <S%H5307>cast<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, that he <S%H4191>die,<s%> and was <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H341>enemy,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> his harm: <S%H7451><s%>

Then the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H5221>slayer<s%> and the <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> judgments: <S%H4941><s%>

And the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he was <S%H5127>fled:<s%> and he shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> in it <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> shall at any time come <S%H3318>without<s%> <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he was <S%H5127>fled;<s%>

And the <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> him <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> and the <S%H1350>revenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7523>kill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7523>slayer;<s%> he shall <S%H369>not<s%> be guilty of blood: <S%H1818><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> he should have <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H4733>refuge<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest:<s%> but <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

So <S%H428>these<s%> things shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for a <S%H2708>statute<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> unto you throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

Whoso <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5221>killeth<s%> any <S%H5315>person,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7523>murderer<s%> shall be put to <S%H7523>death<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H5707>witnesses:<s%> but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6030>testify<s%> against any <S%H5315>person<s%> to cause him to <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Moreover ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3724>satisfaction<s%> for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of a <S%H7523>murderer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7563>guilty<s%> of <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> he shall be surely put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

And ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3724>satisfaction<s%> for him that is <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> that he should come <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

So ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2610>pollute<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> are: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> <S%H2610>defileth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H3722>cleansed<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H8210>shed<s%> therein, <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> by the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of him that <S%H8210>shed<s%> it.

Defile <S%H2930><s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853>therefore<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> shall <S%H3427>inhabit,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H8432><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7931>dwell:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
